summary: Two phony fortune tellers get mixed up with gypsies.
cast: Bert Wheeler|Robert Woolsey|Dorothy Lee|Jobyna Howland|Hugh Trevor|June Clyde|Ivan Lebedeff|Marguerita Padula|Mitchell Lewis|Raymond Maurel|Lita Chevret|Bill Elliott|Audree Henderson|Bob Kortman|Kalla Pasha|Betty Recklaw|Dick Rush|Hector V. Sarno|Harry Semels
title: Los adivinadores, la heredera y una banda de gitanos
